title: A wanderer isn't always lost

replies.body: Really captivating! I liked how you used ingame quotes; I thought that was interesting. It gave me a better understanding of Yasuo's lore, so overall, great work.
Wow, that was actually a pretty decent read, thanks!

Great backstory of an intriguing vagabond and an enjoyable read! I liked his relationship with Taliyah, and its subsequent dialogues. The last paragraph felt a bit awkward, though a simple formatting would make it much clearer, but it's such an enjoyable read that it doesn't detract much. Thanks for sharing!

Super interesting! The title made me worry but the story is actually really well laid out! The only issue being that it doesn't really follow the conventions set down. This is less "A day in runeterra" so much as the story of Yasuo. Otherwise, great read!
The best thing  I have ever read in ages
